summary: This module implements Azure Pipelines integration for the test framework, providing a CI provider that can detect repository changes, retrieve Git metadata, generate resource prefixes, and verify support. It also includes an authentication helper for managing cryptographic keys and a data holder for change information, along with lightweight utilities for interacting with VSO services.
business_intent: Allow automated test suites to run within Azure Pipelines, reliably obtain source control context, handle secure communication, and report build artifacts, thereby facilitating continuous integration and delivery for Ansible testing.
